ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank Unifarm at Wageningen University for the assistance in the greenhouse and Laboratory of Entomology (WUR) for providing caterpillars. We also thank Ciska Raaijmakers for helping with chemical analyses. Funding for this study was provided by China Scholarship Council (CSC) and Department of Terrestrial Ecology at Netherlands Institute of Ecology. We declare that there are no conflicts of interest.
